mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `course_apply_resource` car WHERE car.`user_id` = #{userId} and car.multimedia_type = #{multimediaType} AND car.`is_delete` = 0 ORDER BY car.`create_time` DESC

SELECT car.*, cai.id caiId FROM `course_apply_resource` car LEFT JOIN `course_apply_info` cai ON car.id=cai.`resource_id` WHERE car.`user_id` = #{userId} and car.`is_delete` = 0 GROUP BY car.id ORDER BY car.`create_time` DESC
SELECT car.id,car.`resource`, car.title, car.`create_time` FROM `course_apply_resource` car WHERE car.`is_delete` = 0 AND (car.`length` IS NULL) ORDER BY car.`create_time` ASC
SELECT id FROM oe_course where direct_id = '${directId}'
